author: A_Brickset_user
title: A Decent Starter Set
review:
A couple days ago I purchased this set hoping it would be a good "Starter Kit."  For the most part is has everything you need but all the peices are on the smaller end, there are lots of 2 by 3's which I've never been fond of but none of the longer pieces (longer than 2 x 4 that is) that make good wings for plans and etc.

All and all it's decent.  I should have looked on the back at the bricklisting.  Now I know and hey, it gave me an excuse to buy more.

author: _starwarsninja_
title: good set. bad selection. made in 2003.
review:
Pros: it is a very good starter set, it  was the first set i got! Very good value for your money. it comes with 1000 pieces.  fair color selection

Cons: fair color selection. limited variety of types of pieces.

author: alerimi
title: Great starter set
review:
Great set, i've gat it by ten years already and still lovin' it and creating new stuff and keep mixing it with some other Creator sets or other single-sold bricks.

Pros:
  • Great starter set
  • Mix of many colors
  • Great for kids and as first lego set
  • Poor brick variety pushes imagination to limits

Cons:
  • Wish to have more transparent bricks
  • Not much variety of brick types
  • The instruction book useless (at least for me)
Still a great set and has be with this 16 year old guy all his life. Takes a place in your heart.
